item.description:
Of the thousands of flowering plants in the Arboretum, only one, the lilac, is singled out each year for a daylong celebration. Tours of the lilacs, dance performances, picnicking (allowed on this special day only), and family activities make for a memorable day. Let's meet under the Lilacs...look for balloons. Bring lawn chairs, blankets and your special picnic food...with enough to share. Contact Mark @ 978.314.5371 (cell)

 

Volunteers ad RSVP's welcomed
item.why: Lilac Sunday & Picnic Celebrate Mother's day, Spring & nature and the aroma of the lilacs Be a part of this beloved Boston tradition! The Arboretum is open as usual from dawn to dusk; refreshments and activities available from 10:00am to 4:00pm.
item.name: Celebrate Mother's Day, the beginning of Spring....
